name: @pod-flow/examples
description: Package for generating mock PODs, and a GPC proofs for various examples/use cases.

scripts.location:run-mock: pnpm run location:gen-pods && pnpm run location:gen-distance-proof ./location-bounding/proof-configs/distanceProofConfig.ts ./location-bounding/pod-data/location_pods.json
scripts.item:run-mock: pnpm run item:gen-key-master-params && ts-node item-types/scripts/generateKeyMasterParams.ts && pnpm run item:gen-key-master-proof
